title: Modernize Legacy Desktop Applications
excerpt: Use ComponentOne controls to update mission-critical WPF and WinForms apps, reducing data entry errors and training time without a costly rewrite.

title: Ensure Data Integrity for Regulatory Compliance
excerpt: Build a unified data pipeline using SpreadJS for front-end validation and Document Solutions for automated, secure back-end report generation.

title: Improve Performance in Data-Intensive Apps
excerpt: Integrate Wijmo's high-performance components to resolve critical speed issues in BI dashboards and secure major client renewals.

title: Build Real-Time, High-Frequency Dashboards
excerpt: Leverage Wijmo's datagrid, engineered to process thousands of real-time IoT data updates per second without freezing or crashing.

title: Create Interactive Financial Models on the Web
excerpt: Use SpreadJS to transform insecure, decentralized Excel models into a secure, collaborative web platform that cuts development time in half.

title: Automate Secure Document Generation
excerpt: Use Document Solutions for .NET to automate secure policy and report generation, ensuring 100% compliance and drastically cutting operational costs.
